Welcome! I’m so glad you’re here.

A Mother + Daughter run small business, we manufacture hand made soaps and natural skin care from our cottage, UK. Our soaps contain no artificial colours, fragrances or chemicals, and you can be sure that everything we make is 100% cruelty free.

We believe that skin care should be simple, handmade + with ingredients found in nature. View more

Natural Ingredients

Eco-friendly products

Hand-made with care

Safe for the whole family

natural soap

Pleasure for the Body

We measure everything against a rigorous set of criteria to ensure

Mama + baby soap

$15.00

Soaps made with extracts from nature

Discover our collections

Formulated with wildcrafted plant extracts and essential oils, our moods are named for the benefits their ingredients provide and how they make you feel. Soft palo santo One of our top sellers, this sweet smelling blend.. Renewal Skin Soap The raw beauty tm renewal soap is high in Vitamins B. Luxury Soap Hand soaps that are triple-milled to guarantee the most exceptional quality.

video

See the experience before you feel it.

Why you should choose us

Formulated with wildcrafted plant extracts and essential oils, our moods are named for the benefits their ingredients

Skin health

The soap contains only natural products that are essential for our skin, oils and additives contained in natural soap have bactericidal, antiseptic and anti-inflammatory effects

Natural ingredients

The soap handmade in small batches. Natural soaps are made using only natural vegetable oils. The soap contains no dyes, chemicals or even so common animal fats

Gentle care

Thi soap not only cleanses the skin, but also reliably protects it from the negative effects of city water and other unwanted environmental factors. this soap si suitable not only body wash, but also for washing

Originality

Our soap is a unique, one-of-a-kind product. Even bars from the same batch can vary greatly in shade, dry color pattern in every quality bar of handmade soap, that is the pleasure of using it

Reasons to use natural soap

Here are 18 reasons why you should choose Natural Soaps are chemical-free handmade soaps over commercially mass-produced ones. Shop Bar Soaps

Here's what our clients are saying
